name: Deeper Still (MatthewVEdwards)
description:
In the future humans have been forced to abandon the land and live deep under the sea. However, the ancient monsters that call the ocean floor home are not friendly. Take to your trusty submarine and hunt them down! gain money from expeditions and upgrade your sub to make it even more powerful!

Please note this game is not entirely finished yet, I am still working on it. 

To play, download and unzip the file linked, then click the executable titled "Deeper Still". Enjoy!
